org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr

Class DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoderBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoderBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoder>
    Enclosing class:
    DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder

    public static class DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoderBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoder>
    ChunkEncoderBuilder is a Builder which describes the order of the different encoding schemes used to encode each ZTR Chunk. Encodings can be chained together to improve compression. For example, it might be a good idea to encode a chunk with a Delta encoding and then with a ShrinkToEightBitData encoding since most of the delta values should fit into a single byte each.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • addRunLengthEncoder

        public DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoderBuilder addRunLengthEncoder(byte guard)
        Adds a runLength Encoder using the given guard value. The guard value is used to run length blocks and must be handled specially if it occurs in the un-encoded data; therefore it is preferable to use a guard value that won't occur often or at all in the un-encoded input data.
        Parameters:
        guard - the value of the guard.
        Returns:
        this.

      • addDeltaEncoder

        public DefaultZTRChromatogramWriterBuilder.ChunkEncoderBuilder addDeltaEncoder(DeltaEncodedData deltaEncoder,
                                                                               DeltaEncodedData.Level deltaLevel)
        Add a Delta Encoder of the given type with the given level. It has been found experimentally that DeltaEncodedData.Level.DELTA_LEVEL_3 works better for int size values and DeltaEncodedData.Level.DELTA_LEVEL_1 works better for byte and short sized values.
        Parameters:
        deltaEncoder - the deltaEncoder instance to use.
        deltaLevel - the the delta level to use.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if deltaEncoder or deltaLevel are null.
